title: Supervisor 7.1 (Americas)
description:
Our Supervisor 7.1 solution is designed for candidates applying to entry-level leadership positions who tend to supervise hourly employees. Sample tasks for these jobs include, but are not limited to: planning and preparing work schedules, assigning employees to specific duties; coaching employees on attendance, conduct, schedule adherence, and work tasks, developing employees' skills; training subordinates; prioritizing multiple tasks and priorities; and making day-to-day decisions with minimal guidance from others.
Report Language Availability: English (USA), Canadian French, Brazilian Portuguese.
